courseleaf.title: Catalan (CATALAN)
courseleaf.text:
Terms offered: Fall 2023, Fall 2022, Fall 2021
An intensive course for students with no previous study of Catalan.
Catalan for Advanced Students: Read More [+]

Rules & Requirements

Prerequisites: Credit for 16-20 units or equivalent of another Romance language, or consent of instructor

Hours & Format

Fall and/or spring: 15 weeks - 3 hours of lecture per week

Additional Details

Subject/Course Level: Catalan/Undergraduate

Grading/Final exam status: Letter grade. Alternative to final exam.

Catalan for Advanced Students: Read Less [-]

Terms offered: Spring 2023, Spring 2022, Spring 2021
Selected readings in Catalan prose and poetry.
Readings in Catalan: Read More [+]

Rules & Requirements

Prerequisites: 1 and 2 or 101 or equivalent, or consent of instructor

Repeat rules: Course may be repeated for credit without restriction.

Hours & Format

Fall and/or spring: 15 weeks - 3 hours of lecture per week

Additional Details

Subject/Course Level: Catalan/Undergraduate

Grading/Final exam status: Letter grade. Alternative to final exam.

Readings in Catalan: Read Less [-]
